description: This file defines a user interface component named 'SidebarFilters' for a recipe discovery application, built using the LightningJS framework. It manages UI state, displays filter options (cuisine, difficulty, max time, sorting), and updates application state based on user interactions.

classes.name: SidebarFilters
classes.description: A LightningJS component that provides a user interface for filtering recipes by cuisine, difficulty, max time, and sorting options, with keyboard interaction handling.

methods.name: updateFilters
methods.description: Applies the current filter selections to the global state using the external applyFilters function.

methods.name: updateSort
methods.description: Updates the sorting criteria in the global state based on current selection.
